# Changes to Pokémon & Abilities

- New ability for Salandit line: Fire lash ; PP 60 → 100

# Misc

- Removed Buyer Fever scribble
- Changed Technologic scribble to give tools at stages 2 and 4 (from stages 3 and 15)
- New Scribble: Unown Spell
- New Scribble: The Chosen Ones
- New Town Encounter: Kingambit
